name: Notoris: The Goblin War [Demo]
description:
Notoris is a fantasy war game featuring a unique combination of classic turn-based mechanics in a non-grid-based system. In it, you can command your soldiers in strategic battles, perform epic feats on battlefield and unravel the mysteries behind the Goblins invasion.

This is a early proof of concept prototype for the battles. We are looking to build a community interested in this project. Notoris is being developed by a brand new studio called Flying General Games. We are mainly composed of current students and recent alumni looking to ship their first title. Any donations or support towards this project would be huge for us.

You can find out more about us here.
https://www.flyinggeneralgames.com/

Additonally we are still getting our socials setup, here's out discord link, we'd love to hear what questions players have.
https://discord.gg/mAfCAfjDTr
